client_description_Summary_Note:
González Martín Suárez and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Madrid. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
González Martín Suárez is a 24 year old and comes from Spain.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
client_description_Family_Background: González Martín Suárez is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
In 2018, González graduated from IES Federico García Lorca Granada with a secondary school diploma.
González finished his studies at Pompeu Fabra University in 2023.
client_description_Occupation_History:
González Martín Suárez is a 24 year old and comes from Spain.
González Martín Suárez did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not save any money from his earnings.
Client does not have any properties.In 2020, he received an inheritance of 1870000 EUR from his late grandfather, who was a prominent Corporate Lawyer, and has since invested it in various assets.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is committed to helping González achieve financial success and security as he embarks on his professional journey.
